verses.verse: שָׁמוֹר֙ <S%H8104><s%> sha-mOr Observe אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- חֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> Cho-desh the month הָאָבִ֔יב <S%H24><s%> ha-'a-Viv, of Abib וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta and keep פֶּ֔סַח <S%H6453><s%> Pe-sach, the passover לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha; thy God כִּ֞י <S%H3588><s%> ki in בְּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> be-Cho-desh for in the month הָֽאָבִ֗יב <S%H24><s%> ha-'a-Viv, of Abib הוֹצִ֨יאֲךָ֜ <S%H3318><s%> ho-Tzi-'a-cha brought thee forth יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God מִמִּצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim out of Egypt לָֽיְלָה׃ <S%H3915><s%> La-ye-lah. by night

וְזָבַ֥חְתָּ <S%H2076><s%> ve-za-Vach-ta Thou shalt therefore sacrifice פֶּ֛סַח <S%H6453><s%> Pe-sach the passover לַיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God צֹ֣אן <S%H6629><s%> tzon of the flock וּבָקָ֑ר <S%H1241><s%> u-va-Kar; and the herd בַּמָּקוֹם֙ <S%H4725><s%> bam-ma-kOm in the place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after יִבְחַ֣ר <S%H977><s%> yiv-Char shall choose יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, which the LORD לְשַׁכֵּ֥ן <S%H7931><s%> le-shak-Ken to place שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo his name שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> Sham. in it

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not תֹאכַ֤ל <S%H398><s%> to-Chal Thou shalt eat עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav and חָמֵ֔ץ <S%H2557><s%> cha-Metz, no leavened bread שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'At with it seven יָמִ֛ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim days תֹּֽאכַל־ <S%H398><s%> to-chal- shalt thou eat עָלָ֥יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav with מַצּ֖וֹת <S%H4682><s%> matz-Tzot unleavened bread לֶ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem therewith [even] the bread עֹ֑נִי <S%H6040><s%> 'O-ni; of affliction כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki in בְחִפָּז֗וֹן <S%H2649><s%> ve-chip-pa-Zon, in haste יָצָ֙אתָ֙ <S%H3318><s%> ya-Tza-ta for thou camest forth מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an that תִּזְכֹּ֗ר <S%H2142><s%> tiz-Kor, that thou mayest remember אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- י֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom the day צֵֽאתְךָ֙ <S%H3318><s%> tze-te-Cha when thou camest forth מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> kol all יְמֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> ye-Mei] all the days חַיֶּֽיךָ׃ <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yei-cha.] of thy life

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- no יֵרָאֶ֨ה <S%H7200><s%> ye-ra-'Eh seen לְךָ֥ le-Cha שְׂאֹ֛ר <S%H7603><s%> se-'Or And there shall be no leavened bread בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all גְּבֻלְךָ֖ <S%H1366><s%> ge-vul-Cha with thee in all thy coast שִׁבְעַ֣ת <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'At seven יָמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim; days וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- and none יָלִ֣ין <S%H3885><s%> ya-Lin remain מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at הַבָּשָׂ֗ר <S%H1320><s%> hab-ba-Sar, neither shall there [any thing] of the flesh אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which תִּזְבַּ֥ח <S%H2076><s%> tiz-Bach which thou sacrificedst בָּעֶ֛רֶב <S%H6153><s%> ba-'E-rev at even בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom day הָרִאשׁ֖וֹן <S%H7223><s%> ha-ri-Shon the first לַבֹּֽקֶר׃ <S%H1242><s%> lab-Bo-ker. all night until the morning

לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo are not תוּכַ֖ל <S%H3201><s%> tu-Chal Thou mayest לִזְבֹּ֣חַ <S%H2076><s%> liz-Bo-ach not sacrifice אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַפָּ֑סַח <S%H6453><s%> hap-Pa-sach; the passover בְּאַחַ֣ד <S%H259><s%> be-'a-Chad within any שְׁעָרֶ֔יךָ <S%H8179><s%> she-'a-Rei-cha, of thy gates אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> no-Ten giveth לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הַמָּק֞וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ham-ma-Kom But at the place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after יִבְחַ֨ר <S%H977><s%> yiv-Char shall choose יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God לְשַׁכֵּ֣ן <S%H7931><s%> le-shak-Ken to place שְׁמ֔וֹ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo, his name שָׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> sham in it תִּזְבַּ֥ח <S%H2076><s%> tiz-Bach in there thou shalt sacrifice אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַפֶּ֖סַח <S%H6453><s%> hap-Pe-sach the passover בָּעָ֑רֶב <S%H6153><s%> ba-'A-rev; at even כְּב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> ke-Vo at the going down הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> hash-She-mesh, of the sun מוֹעֵ֖ד <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed at the season צֵֽאתְךָ֥ <S%H3318><s%> tze-te-Cha that thou camest forth מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim. out of Egypt

וּבִשַּׁלְתָּ֙ <S%H1310><s%> u-vish-shal-Ta And thou shalt roast וְאָ֣כַלְתָּ֔ <S%H398><s%> ve-'A-chal-ta, and eat בַּמָּק֕וֹם <S%H4725><s%> bam-ma-Kom [it] in the place אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יִבְחַ֛ר <S%H977><s%> yiv-Char shall choose יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God בּ֑וֹ bo; וּפָנִ֣יתָ <S%H6437><s%> u-fa-Ni-ta and thou shalt turn בַבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> vab-Bo-ker, in the morning וְהָלַכְתָּ֖ <S%H1980><s%> ve-ha-lach-Ta and go לְאֹהָלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H168><s%> le-'o-ha-Lei-cha. unto thy tents

שֵׁ֥שֶׁת <S%H8337><s%> She-shet Six יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim days תֹּאכַ֣ל <S%H398><s%> to-Chal thou shalt eat מַצּ֑וֹת <S%H4682><s%> matz-Tzot; unleavened bread וּבַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> u-vai-Yom day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <S%H7637><s%> hash-she-vi-'I, and on the seventh עֲצֶ֙רֶת֙ <S%H6116><s%> 'a-Tze-ret [shall be] a solemn assembly לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh to the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo no תַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh thou shalt do מְלָאכָֽה׃ <S%H4399><s%> me-la-Chah. no work ס sa-Mek

שִׁבְעָ֥ה <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'Ah Seven שָׁבֻעֹ֖ת <S%H7620><s%> sha-vu-'Ot weeks תִּסְפָּר־ <S%H5608><s%> tis-por- shalt thou number לָ֑ךְ Lach; מֵהָחֵ֤ל <S%H2490><s%> me-ha-Chel unto thee begin חֶרְמֵשׁ֙ <S%H2770><s%> cher-Mesh [to put] the sickle בַּקָּמָ֔ה <S%H7054><s%> bak-ka-Mah, to the corn תָּחֵ֣ל <S%H2490><s%> ta-Chel from [such time as] thou beginnest לִסְפֹּ֔ר <S%H5608><s%> lis-Por, to number שִׁבְעָ֖ה <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'Ah the seven שָׁבֻעֽוֹת׃ <S%H7620><s%> sha-vu-'ot. weeks

וְעָשִׂ֜יתָ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt keep חַ֤ג <S%H2282><s%> chag the feast שָׁבֻעוֹת֙ <S%H7620><s%> sha-vu-'Ot of weeks לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God מִסַּ֛ת <S%H4530><s%> mis-Sat with a tribute נִדְבַ֥ת <S%H5071><s%> nid-Vat of a freewill offering יָדְךָ֖ <S%H3027><s%> ya-de-Cha of thine hand אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which תִּתֵּ֑ן <S%H5414><s%> tit-Ten; which thou shalt give כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher which יְבָרֶכְךָ֖ <S%H1288><s%> ye-va-rech-Cha hath blessed יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [unto the LORD thy God] according as the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha. thy God

וְשָׂמַחְתָּ֞ <S%H8055><s%> ve-sa-mach-Ta And thou shalt rejoice לִפְנֵ֣י׀ <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God אַתָּ֨ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you וּבִנְךָ֣ <S%H1121><s%> u-vin-Cha thou and thy son וּבִתֶּךָ֮ <S%H1323><s%> u-vit-te-Cha and thy daughter וְעַבְדְּךָ֣ <S%H5650><s%> ve-'av-de-Cha and thy manservant וַאֲמָתֶךָ֒ <S%H519><s%> va-'a-ma-te-Cha and thy maidservant וְהַלֵּוִי֙ <S%H3881><s%> ve-hal-le-Vi and the Levite אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who בִּשְׁעָרֶ֔יךָ <S%H8179><s%> bish-'a-Rei-cha, that [is] within thy gates וְהַגֵּ֛ר <S%H1616><s%> ve-hag-Ger and the stranger וְהַיָּת֥וֹם <S%H3490><s%> ve-hai-ya-Tom and the fatherless וְהָאַלְמָנָ֖ה <S%H490><s%> ve-ha-'al-ma-Nah and the widow אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who בְּקִרְבֶּ֑ךָ <S%H7130><s%> be-kir-Be-cha; that [are] among בַּמָּק֗וֹם <S%H4725><s%> bam-ma-Kom, you in the place אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who יִבְחַר֙ <S%H977><s%> yiv-Char hath chosen יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God לְשַׁכֵּ֥ן <S%H7931><s%> le-shak-Ken to place שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo] his name שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> Sham.] in it

וְזָ֣כַרְתָּ֔ <S%H2142><s%> ve-Za-char-ta, And thou shalt remember כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for עֶ֥בֶד <S%H5650><s%> 'E-ved that thou wast a bondman הָיִ֖יתָ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yi-ta become בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> be-mitz-Ra-yim; in Egypt וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H8104><s%> ve-sha-mar-Ta and thou shalt observe וְעָשִׂ֔יתָ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta, and do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַֽחֻקִּ֖ים <S%H2706><s%> ha-chuk-Kim these statutes הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh. these פ Peh

חַ֧ג <S%H2282><s%> chag the feast הַסֻּכֹּ֛ת <S%H5521><s%> has-suk-Kot of tabernacles תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh Thou shalt observe לְךָ֖ le-Cha שִׁבְעַ֣ת <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'At seven יָמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim; days בְּאָ֨סְפְּךָ֔ <S%H622><s%> be-'A-se-pe-cha, after that thou hast gathered מִֽגָּרְנְךָ֖ <S%H1637><s%> mig-ga-re-ne-Cha in thy corn וּמִיִּקְבֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3342><s%> u-mi-yik-Ve-cha. and thy wine

וְשָׂמַחְתָּ֖ <S%H8055><s%> ve-sa-mach-Ta And thou shalt rejoice בְּחַגֶּ֑ךָ <S%H2282><s%> be-chag-Ge-cha; in thy feast אַתָּ֨ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you וּבִנְךָ֤ <S%H1121><s%> u-vin-Cha thou and thy son וּבִתֶּ֙ךָ֙ <S%H1323><s%> u-vit-Te-cha and thy daughter וְעַבְדְּךָ֣ <S%H5650><s%> ve-'av-de-Cha and thy manservant וַאֲמָתֶ֔ךָ <S%H519><s%> va-'a-ma-Te-cha, and thy maidservant וְהַלֵּוִ֗י <S%H3881><s%> ve-hal-le-Vi, and the Levite וְהַגֵּ֛ר <S%H1616><s%> ve-hag-Ger the stranger וְהַיָּת֥וֹם <S%H3490><s%> ve-hai-ya-Tom and the fatherless וְהָאַלְמָנָ֖ה <S%H490><s%> ve-ha-'al-ma-Nah and the widow אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who בִּשְׁעָרֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H8179><s%> bish-'a-Rei-cha. that [are] within thy gates

שִׁבְעַ֣ת <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'At Seven יָמִ֗ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim, days תָּחֹג֙ <S%H2287><s%> ta-Chog shalt thou keep a solemn feast לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God בַּמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> bam-ma-Kom in the place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which יִבְחַ֣ר <S%H977><s%> yiv-Char shall choose יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; which the LORD כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki because יְבָרֶכְךָ֞ <S%H1288><s%> ye-va-rech-Cha shall bless יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh because the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God בְּכֹ֤ל <S%H3605><s%> be-Chol all תְּבוּאָֽתְךָ֙ <S%H8393><s%> te-vu-'a-te-Cha thee in all thine increase וּבְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> u-ve-Chol all מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Seh and in all the works יָדֶ֔יךָ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dei-cha, of thine hands וְהָיִ֖יתָ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yi-ta become אַ֥ךְ <S%H389><s%> 'ach you will be altogether שָׂמֵֽחַ׃ <S%H8056><s%> sa-Me-ach. therefore thou shalt surely rejoice
